text.content: "Acting Captain Lieutenant Uhura's personal log, star date 2259.55. My new friend ~name~, has beamed up to my quarters to assist me in my research of early twenty-first century Earth mating practices while the rest of the crew enjoys their well earned shore leave on the planet below. Due to his promptness, I find myself unprepared for his arrival..."
